headline: The Bull Case For Snap-on (SNA) Could Change Following Mixed 2025 Results And Capital Returns – Learn Why
summary: Earlier this month, Snap-on’s board declared a quarterly dividend of US$2.44 per share for payment on March 10, 2026, alongside reporting full-year 2025 sales of US$4,743.2 million and net income of US$1,016.9 million, plus completion of a US$271.9 million share repurchase program covering 1.59% of shares. These results show Snap-on continuing its long record of uninterrupted quarterly dividends since 1939 while also using buybacks to reduce its share count during a year of slightly higher...
